snippet: The Cal coach, Steve Desimone, turned the lack of financial support from the university into an opportunity to fix a college model he considered broken.
abstract: Profile of University of California golf coach Steve Desimone, who, for better part of four decades, has been devoted to putting student back in student-athlete; Desimone has succeeded at Cal despite receiving no direct funding from university, turning lack of financial support into golden opportunity to fix college model he considered broken; under Desimone Cal has produced 13 all-Americans and 17 all-American scholars, capturing NCAA team title in 2004 and advancing to team semifinals in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Cal coach, Steve Desimone, turned the lack of financial support from the university into an opportunity to fix a college model he considered broken.

headline.seo: A Class College Golf Program, On and Off Course
headline.main: Cal Men’s Golf Team Plays and Pays Own Way to Top
headline.print_headline: Cal Men’s Golf Team Plays And Pays Own Way to Top
